column2: "I know you've been working as a Ranger, but don't you feel kind of--I don't know-- kind of blah sometimes?"
"It's like, that recoil you love to feel and the violent impact of bullets on hostiles just isn't the same anymore."
"Well, just don't think about it. If you keep the firing and killing up, eventually it will stop bothering you."
"You know what we Rangers love to do, right? Yep, we love to shoot and then shoot some more!"
"So how about some fun with guns in the Lost Sea? We'll just go where the whim takes us, shooting, reloading, shooting, reloading..."
